018package org.apache.commons.lang3.function;
019
020import java.util.function.DoubleToLongFunction;
021
022/**
023 * A functional interface like {@link DoubleToLongFunction} that declares a {@link Throwable}.
024 *
025 * @param <E> The kind of thrown exception or error.
026 * @since 3.11
027 */
028@FunctionalInterface
029public interface FailableDoubleToLongFunction<E extends Throwable> {
030
031    /** NOP singleton */
032    @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
033    FailableDoubleToLongFunction NOP = t -> 0;
034
035    /**
036     * Returns The NOP singleton.
037     *
038     * @param <E> The kind of thrown exception or error.
039     * @return The NOP singleton.
040     */
041    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
042    static <E extends Throwable> FailableDoubleToLongFunction<E> nop() {
043        return NOP;
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * Applies this function to the given argument.
048     *
049     * @param value the function argument
050     * @return the function result
051     * @throws E if the operation fails
052     */
053    int applyAsLong(double value) throws E;
054}
